message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $105.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $100 for the product.
